complaint.description: Vodacom not responding to Hello Peter complaint
complaint.suggestion: Vodacom should respond to the customer's complaint and address their concerns

meta.review_title: Vodacom not respondding to Hello Peter complaint
meta.review_content: Next attempt: Vodacom, you have not responded to my previous complaints. Why did you give my number away and discontinue my sim card after 21 years. I want my number on that sim and my number back. I hold you accountable for loss of business and WILL go to the ombudsman next. I require someone human at vodacom who is not a robot to pay attention!
